original_title: 園子温ファンタ・ジア　SHORT FILM COLLECTION
overview: An omnibus drama directed by the genius Sion Sono. Popular idols such as Sakura Mizutani and Yoko Mitsuya will appear, and a fantastic and mysterious story will unfold. Includes Chapter 1 "Woman in the Finder", Chapter 2 "No Memory Woman", Chapter 3 "Virtual Love", and Chapter 4 "Love Doctor".
title: Sion Sono Fantasia Short Film Collection
